title: The KEEN Universe: An Ecosystem for Knowledge Graph Embeddings with a Focus on Reproducibility and Transferability

author: Mehdi Ali, Institute of Computer Science, University of Bonn

segmentation: So I will present our work called the King universe, an ecosystem for knowledge graph embeddings with focus.
Reproducibility and transferability.
In the beginning I will give a short introduction about our work and speak about the foundations.
Then in the main part I will speak about the methodology for our ecosystem, where we focused on two aspects, first reproducibility and 2nd transferability.
Then we show some applications in specific prediction of cross talks and hierarchies between biological pathways.
And then I show how we evaluated our ecosystem and at the end that we give a short discussion and talk about our future work.
